hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{7} \text{ boys}\\
+& \underline{\blue{?} \text{ girls}}\\
=&\pink{14} \text{ people invited}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{14} \text{ people invited}\\
-& \underline{\green{7} \text{ boys}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ girls}\end{align}$

question.content:
I invited $14$ people to my birthday party. $7$ were boys and the rest were girls.

**How many girls did I invite? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] girls
